page.title: 05TRADE IN KILREA
page.content: {TRADE:}THE LOCAL SHOPS SERVE THE EVERYDAY NEEDS OF THE TOWN'S PEOPLE.FOOD AND GROCERY SHOPS ARE NUMEROUS.THERE ARE ALSO CLOTHES,FOOTWEAR,ELECTRICAL AND GIFT SHOPS. {STREET TRADERS:}IN KILREA ON A WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY A MAN CALLED BARNEY DEVLIN COMES TO THE TOWN.HE DRIVES A LITTLE RED VAN.ON THIS VAN HE HAS FRUIT,VEGETABLES AND FISH WHICH HE SELLS TO THE LOCAL PEOPLE. {STALL HOLDERS:}ON TUESDAY THERE IS A MAN WHO PITCHES HIS STALL OUTSIDE THE MERCER'S ARMS.HE SELLS GARDEN PLANTS AND FLOWERS. {PUBS:}THERE ARE NUMEROUS PUBS IN KILREA.MANY OF THESE PUBS SELL SANDWICHES AND SNACKS AS WELL AS ALCOHOL.
